column4: whenever i run a flash based site, the flash seems to lag HORRIBLY, but it lags less on my Debian distro, and i have virtually no lag on my windows install
did you install flashplugin-nonfree or gnash or both and/or another?
flashplugin-nonfree or the one direct from adobe.. but you can't run 2 at the same time.
make sure you uninstall the other before installing the new
